R package PxWebApiData

PxWebApiData on CRAN pkgdown website GitHub Repository

PX-Web data by API: The R package PxWebApiData supports both PxWebApi v1 and PxWebApi v2.

The example code reads data from three national statistical institutes: Statistics Norway, Statistics Sweden, and Statistics Finland.

PxWebApi v1

PxWebApi v1 is supported through the long-established ApiData() interface.

ðŸ“Œ Function reference:

  • ApiData()

ðŸ“Œ Vignette:

  • Using PxWebApi v1 with PxWebApiData

PxWebApi v2

PxWebApi v2 is supported through a set of new functions.

ðŸ“Œ Function references:

  • get_api_data() â€“ retrieve data from a pre-made URL
  • query_url() â€“ generate a data URL from specifications
  • api_data() â€“ specify and retrieve data in one step (closely related to ApiData() for PxWebApi v1)
  • meta_frames() â€“ metadata structured as data frames
  • meta_data() â€“ metadata downloaded without further processing
  • meta_code_list() â€“ metadata for code lists

ðŸ“Œ Vignette:

  • Using PxWebApi v2 with PxWebApiData

Official version on CRAN: https://cran.r-project.org/package=PxWebApiData
